title: Atomically dispersed metal cocatalysts for solar energy conversion
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7649-7680
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03065F, Review Article
Kejian Kong, Hao Zhang, Ali Han, Feng Li, Dingsheng Wang
This review explores the role of atomic metal site cocatalysts in photocatalysis for solar energy conversion, focusing on the recent advances in single-atom and atomic cluster cocatalysts, their structureâ€“activity relationships, and key applications.
